thematic 0.0.1
  • Reference

Query the current thematic theme

Source: R/thematic.R
thematic_get.Rd

thematic_get() returns information about the entire theme, whereas thematic_get_option() returns information about a specific option.

thematic_get()

thematic_get_option(name = "", default = NULL)

thematic_get_mixture(amounts = 0.5)

Arguments

name

a theme element name (e.g., fg, bg, etc.)
default

a default value to return in the event no thematic theme is active.
amounts

value(s) between 0 and 1 specifying how much to mix fg (0) and bg (1).

Examples

thematic_get()
#> NULL
thematic_on("darkblue", "skyblue")
thematic_get_option("bg")
#> [1] "darkblue"

if (interactive()) {
  scales::show_col(thematic_get_mixture(seq(0, 1, by = 0.1)))
}
